title: Evan Lum
text:
Hello, My name is Evan and I’m currently a fourth-year undergraduate student studying statistics and data science at UCLA.
I’ve always been fascinated by optimization, constantly seeking ways to enhance even the smallest aspects of my routine, from video games to my workouts to everyday tasks. The power of statistics has sharpened my ability to make many improvements, inspiring me to pursue a career in the field.

title: Evan Lum
text:
Education
University of California, Los Angeles
B.S in Statistics and Data Science | Aug 2023 - June 2025
San Francisco Community College
Associate’s in Data Science | Aug 2021 - June 2023

title: Evan Lum
